LanguageData.TerranBunker.label: Bunker
LanguageData.TerranBunker.description: Fortifications that can accommodate four combatants. Full-angle firing holes allow soldiers to fire at the enemy outside from inside the bunker with ease.

LanguageData.TerranBunker_Frame.description: Fortifications that can accommodate four combatants. Full-angle firing holes allow soldiers to fire at the enemy outside from inside the bunker with ease.
LanguageData.Turret_TerranBunker.label: Firing Holes
